description:
MeanStateGlobalMetrics: global mean precip, evaporation, ocean heat content.
MeanStateRegionalMetrics: sea ice concentration, jet location, tropical warm pool.
AdjustedParameters: turbulence overshooting at the PBL top, aerosols microphysical properties.
